verbs.description: israel boeing sign reciprocal spending deal boeing [V: has] agreed to spend billions of dollars in israel over the coming decade if it wins major defense contracts israel economy ministry said on tuesday são paulo israel boeing eli cohen israeli government ari rabinovitch united states defence ministry barack obama economy ministry prime minister benjamin netanyahu sao paulo adrian croft
